Private and public sector civic tech with Emily Fong 💻🏛

Feb 18, 2020

  • civictech
  • episode
  • digital service
  • finance
  • usds
  • census
  • innovation teams

Leah Bannon, Mohith Rao, and Ryan Koch sit down with returning guest Emily Fong (they appeared on episode 16). We’ll talk about the work they’re doing in the space where finance and civic tech meet, their community organizing efforts, and their product management practice.
